front.title: A View on IPv6 Transition Architecture

abstract.t: The transition from IPv4 to IPv6 and co-existence of IPv4 and IPv6 isa subject of much debate. However, the big picture of the transitiondoesn't seem to have been discussed sufficiently. Therefore,different people have different assumptions on the process, whichmakes planning the transition architecture very difficult. This memotries to point out some issues that will need consideration in thetransition architecture.
